appName: Rift Hero: Mixed Reality Horde Survival
displayName: Rift Hero: Mixed Reality Horde Survival
display_name: Rift Hero: Mixed Reality Horde Survival
display_long_description:
Rift Hero is an electrifying roguelike horde survival shooter crafted for the immersive world of mixed reality. It combines the pulse-pounding excitement of mixed-reality home defense combat with the engaging gameplay style inspired by Vampire Survivor. As a part of the RIFTER organization, you'll encounter:

- True Survival Horde designed for Mixed Reality: Experience frantic home invasions via spatial portals (RIFT) straight into your living room or backyard. Arm yourself with the teleported mech arm and construct in-home fortifications for protection.

[media]

- Hordes of Enemies from Diverse Apocalypses: Confront a vast assortment of zombies and monsters congregating for intense rogue-like battles. Navigate through a sequence of realistic battlefields laden with unique challenges.

[media]

- Addictive Vampire Survivor-Inspired Gameplay: Swiftly collect EXP gems to obtain randomized power-ups. Customize, unlock, and enhance your mech build with tens of categories of intricately designed weapons and machinery systems.

[media]
